prompt:

    And this is a biography that contains all the information from this profile.

    Tariq Al-Mansour is a 34-year-old Saudi Arabian Senior Engineer at Saudi Aramco, based in Dhahran. response:
```
Tariq Al-Mansour, a 34-year-old Saudi Arabian, serves as a Senior Engineer at Saudi Aramco in Dhahran. With nine years of industry experience, he has established himself as a leader in the petroleum engineering field, particularly in the areas of innovative extraction methods and energy efficiency. Tariq earned his PhD in Petroleum Engineering from Stanford University in 2014, an achievement that expanded his technical knowledge and international outlook. Fluent in both Arabic and English, he actively participates in cross-cultural projects and international conferences. Outside of work, Tariq enjoys challenging himself with chess and exploring the desert through camping, activities that reflect his appreciation for both mental strategy and the natural heritage of his country. His dedication to excellence in both his career and personal life distinguishes him as an influential figure in the energy sector.
```
